comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Open JSP file with Web Page Editor
2. Select some text on design page.
3. Select context menu [Style] > [Make Link]
  --> nothing happens.


More information:
There are ClassCastException reported on .log file.
